verses.roman:
rukmy agrajo rukmaratho
rukmabāhur anantaraḥ
rukmakeśo rukmamālī
rukmiṇy eṣā svasā satī

synonyms: rukmī—Rukmī; agra-jaḥ—the first-born; rukma-rathaḥ rukmabāhuḥ—Rukmaratha and Rukmabāhu; anantaraḥ—following him; rukma-keśaḥ rukma-mālī—Rukmakeśa and Rukmamālī; rukmiṇī—Rukmiṇī; eṣā—she; svasā—sister; satī—of saintly character.
translation: Rukmī was the first-born son, followed by Rukmaratha, Rukmabāhu, Rukmakeśa and Rukmamālī. Their sister was the exalted Rukmiṇī.
